Description: EXCELLENT CONDITIONYou are bidding on a Vintage 1978 Gibson USA made Les Paul Custom finished in beautiful Glossy Ebony that is in Super Clean condition. This highly sought after rare guitar is simply stunning. This piece was in its case for much of its 40 years. Like new. No exaggeration. This guitar is100% Original with NO BREAKS or REPAIRS.The body is in exceptionally clean condition with some light tarnish on the gold hardware. The original frets are hardly broken in with plenty of life left in them.This guitar has aged beautifully with tons of character, stunning looks and an awesome sound to match. Included in this listing is the original Gibson case, strap and paperwork as pictured. All in excellent, clean condition. Please check the pictures and ask any questions in advance of bidding. All sales final. Only PayPal accepted. I reserve the right to end this auction at any time. Shipping only in the 48 states. UPS. Shipping, fully insured for the purchase final price is $100.
